name: A Broken Village
description:
A Broken Village

Your village is under attack. Creatures have come to destroy your homes and it is up to your to repair them using materials found around the village.

Break trees and grass to repair your homes... Survive for 5 minutes to win.

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Mouse 1 - Interact with item (Use hotbar item)
  • 1-9 - Hotbar selection
  • Q - Drop item
  • ESC - Pause Game
Credits

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2020 by the following:

  • Ben Nilsson - Programmer
  • Oliver Parrish - Art, Level Builder, VFX
  • Cathan Bertram - Sound, Art, Audio Programmer
